EmailTemplate.description: This email template is used to Notify Vineti To Create Order on receipt of Aph PO from Atlas
EmailTemplate.name: Notify Vineti To Create Order Template
EmailTemplate.subject: New order to be created in Vineti, Aph PO Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear V2V Manager,
The Apheresis PO has been received for the new Order {!Order.Id}. Request you to please set up this order in Vineti.
order
Regards, CCM Operations Coordinator
